These are the words of Nehemiah son of Hacaliah:

It so happened that in the month of Kislev, in the twentieth year, I was in Susa the citadel.
Hanani, who was one of my relatives, along with some of the men from Judah, came to me, and I asked them about the Jews who had escaped and had survived the exile, and about Jerusalem.

They said to me, “The remnant that remains from the exile there in the province are experiencing considerable adversity and reproach. The wall of Jerusalem lies breached, and its gates have been burned down!”
When I heard these things I sat down abruptly, crying and mourning for several days. I continued fasting and praying before the God of heaven.
Then I said, “Please, O Lord God of heaven, great and awesome God, who keeps his loving covenant with those who love him and obey his commandments,

<st data-num="04994" class="">may</st> your <st data-num="0241" class="">ear</st> <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> <st data-num="07183" class="">attentive</st> and your <st data-num="05869" class="">eyes</st> be <st data-num="06605" class="">open</st> to <st data-num="08085 0413">hear</st> the <st data-num="08605" class="">prayer</st> of your <st data-num="05650" class="">servant</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> <st data-num="0595" class="">I</st> am <st data-num="06419" class="">praying</st> <st data-num="06440" class="">to</st> you <st data-num="03117" class="">today</st> throughout both <st data-num="03119" class="">day</st> and <st data-num="03915" class="">night</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on behalf of</st> your <st data-num="05650" class="">servants</st> the <st data-num="01121 03478">Israelites</st>. I am <st data-num="03034 05921">confessing</st> the <st data-num="02403" class="">sins</st> of the <st data-num="01121 03478">Israelites</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> we have <st data-num="02398" class="">committed</st><n id="1" /> against you—both I <st data-num="0589" class="">myself</st> and my <st data-num="01004 01">family</st><n id="2" /> have <st data-num="02398" class="">sinned</st>.

We have <st data-num="02254" class="">behaved</st> <st data-num="02254" class="">corruptly</st> against you, <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="08104" class="">obeying</st> the <st data-num="04687" class="">commandments</st>, the <st data-num="02706" class="">statutes</st>, and the <st data-num="04941" class="">judgments</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> you <st data-num="06680" class="">commanded</st> your <st data-num="05650" class="">servant</st> <st data-num="04872" class="">Moses</st>.

<st data-num="04994" class="">Please</st> <st data-num="02142" class="">recall</st> the <st data-num="01697 0834">word</st> you <st data-num="06680 0559">commanded</st> your <st data-num="05650" class="">servant</st> <st data-num="04872" class="">Moses</st>: ‘If <st data-num="0859" class="">you</st> <st data-num="04603" class="">act unfaithfully</st>, <st data-num="0589" class="">I</st> will <st data-num="06327" class="">scatter</st> you among the <st data-num="05971" class="">nations</st>.<n id="1" />

But if you <st data-num="07725 0413">repent</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="08104" class="">obey</st><n id="2" /> my <st data-num="04687" class="">commandments</st> and <st data-num="06213" class="">do</st> them, then <st data-num="0518" class="">even if</st> your <st data-num="05080">dispersed people</st> <st data-num="01961" class="">are</st> in the <st data-num="07097" class="">most remote</st> <st data-num="08064" class="">location</st>,<n id="3" /> I will <st data-num="06908" class="">gather</st> them from <st data-num="08033" class="">there</st> and <st data-num="0935" class="">bring</st> them <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="04725 0834">place</st> I have <st data-num="0977" class="">chosen</st> for my <st data-num="08034" class="">name</st> to <st data-num="07931 08033">reside</st>.’

<st data-num="01992" class="">They</st> are your <st data-num="05650" class="">servants</st> and your <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st>, <st data-num="0834" class="">whom</st> you have <st data-num="06299" class="">redeemed</st> by your <st data-num="01419" class="">mighty</st> <st data-num="03581" class="">strength</st> and by your <st data-num="02389" class="">powerful</st> <st data-num="03027" class="">hand</st>.

Please, Lord, listen attentively to the prayer of your servant and to the prayer of your servants who take pleasure in showing respect to your name. Grant your servant success today and show compassion to me in the presence of this man.”

Now I was cupbearer for the king.
